localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: 92% of all bad advice on Twitter begins w/the phrase “pro tip”
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text: 推特上92%的坏建议都是以 "专业建议 "开头的。
推特上92%的壞建議都是以 "專業建議 "開頭的。
